title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: bundle, ship and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs as a single self-contained binary with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; pip install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs and embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive TUI for Ollama (fuzzy model finder, chat history, syntax highlighting).

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama (Spring Boot starters included).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama API with Rails helpers.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK and ASP.NET Core middleware for Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators and embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) for Ollama server.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings local LLM summarization and Q&A to your vault.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve deployment recipes for scaling Ollama models across GPUs and nodes.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats using Ollama models and supports slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local LLMs into channels via Ollama.

title: ollama-whatsapp
summary: WhatsApp bot using Twilio and Ollama for on-device chat without cloud LLMs.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that connects to Ollama with markdown and code highlighting.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API for managing and chatting with Ollama models from the browser.
